issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Query execution enhancements for 1.0.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There a number of optimizations that can be made to the new query execution and this is a top level story to track them all.
